# cronk-list



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                     | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `bullets` | `bullets` | Show/hide bullets                               | `boolean` | `true`  |
| `items`   | --        | any[] of items to list                          | `any[]`   | `[]`    |
| `ordered` | `ordered` | Render bullets as numbers (true) or not (discs) | `boolean` | `false` |
| `reverse` | `reverse` | reverse the provided order                      | `boolean` | `false` |
